list.name: Default
list.comment: Protip: Don't get random values in constructors.

task.summary: Test commit via IntelliJ. I only wanted to decrease the hurt volume...

Changelog: - TMX to SMF converter - Platform dependent stuff - "Flexible" pause menu - Fixing weird font blurriness when in weird positions (aka switch to TextureFilter.Nearest) - JavaDocs have import dependencies... o.O?! - other random stuff
Separated shaders, added info, fixed typos.
IntelliJ, Y U blacklist random files from VCS?
Missing file added: converter.sh Feel free to convert it to a Windoze Batch .bat file...
